info.title: Adding content to a knowledge base

abstract.para: This topic explains how to add a new content to an existing knowledge base.

step.para: In the &owui; interface, click Workspace in the upper part of the left panel and scroll to the knowledge base that you want to add content to. Use the pager at the bottom if the knowledge base is not listed on the current screen.
Click the knowledge base name and in the Search Collection files, click the plus sign.
From the drop-down list, you can choose whether to upload local files, upload or synchronize the whole local directory, or add a text snippet as a context. Confirm with Upload.
The uploaded resource is processed and analyzed so that you can use it as a context for selected AI models.
